Title: A Fowl Concoction
Description:
We need to put an end to this duck invasion.

While I was shooing some stragglers away from the inn, a flock showed up and made off with some of our decorations and eggs. My precious heirloom was among the items stolen!

Please, $n. I won't stand for these pilfering poultry. I know a mage in Stormwind who might have some ideas on how to handle this.
ObjectivesText: Speak with Emmery Fiske at the Wizard's Sanctum in Stormwind.

Objectives.Text: Speak with Emmery Fiske at the Wizard's Sanctum in Stormwind.
